  • THE 2 YEAR A – LEVEL PROGRAMME
  • UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION PROGRAMME
  • PRE – UNIVERSITY PROGRAMME
  • SSCE IMPROVEMENT STUDY PROGRAMME
  • OTHER ASPECTS OF THE PROGRAMME
  • SUPPORT SERVICES
  • ADMISSION PROCESS
Menu
  • HOME
  • THE 2 YEAR A – LEVEL PROGRAMME
  • UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION PROGRAMME
  • PRE – UNIVERSITY PROGRAMME
  • SSCE IMPROVEMENT STUDY PROGRAMME
  • OTHER ASPECTS OF THE PROGRAMME
  • SUPPORT SERVICES
  • ADMISSION PROCESS

2022-2023
Admission Ongoing

Start Equiry ViaWhatsApp

Pacific Sixth Form College is a pre-degree school located at Shasha, Lagos. It was established to provide tuition for those intending to pursue higher education.

Our aim is to give the adolescent the opportunity to develop into a young adults, explore and unlock their potential while taking responsibility for their learning to build self-confidence, skill, and a good sense of judgment.

The college is organized to take care of all that will qualify students to gain admission into top universities in Nigeria and abroad.

Olasoji Adetuberu

Coordinator

Welcome

I warmly welcome you to Pacific Sixth Form College. The College was established to attend to students within the age range of 15-18 years who are desirous of choice courses in top universities. Our team of dedicated teachers provides the required instruction to develop the student’s skills, knowledge, and competencies in their chosen courses.

The students benefit from a wide range of 21st-century teaching and learning tools. Apart from preparing our students academically for undergraduate studies, we also have activities for their social and psychological development. They are taught interpersonal and survival skills in an ever-changing and competitive world.

We assist and guide them in their placement into universities and provide a guide for funding opportunities. Our students will also be taught to write personal statements, an essential ingredient for overseas admissions. Visa guidance will also be provided to assist students in their desired country of study.

Why not join us today for an opportunity to benefit from all the above and more. We promise you support to make your future successful and exciting.

Misssion Statement

The Mission of our Sixth Form Programme is to enable  our students to achieve their maximum potential giving them an opportunity to learn, deepen their knowledge, and build a solid foundation for a successful academic or professional career and thus guarantee progression to choice courses and universities on completion.

Our Sixth Forms Programs

Our Sixth Form Program provides tuition for those intending to pursue higher education. It provides effective preparation for public examinations by thorough exam-specific teaching and close attention to the needs of each individual student.

The Sixth Form Programme is a vibrant part of our college where enthusiastic and talented 15-18 years olds have the opportunity to develop into young adults, explore and unlock their potential while taking responsibility for their learning to build self-confidence, skills and a good sense of judgment.

The Sixth Form students flourish in an environment of challenge, encouragement and possibilities. The Programme is an ideal bridge for the transition from secondary school life to the wider world of university and employment.

The programme is organized to take care of all that will qualify a student to gain admission to the University.

Our programmes include:

  1. 2-year Advanced Level Programme.
  2. Ten months University Foundation Programme.
  3. One-year Pre -University Programme.
  4. SSCE Improvement Study Programme.

The 2 Year A - Level Programme

This programme covers two academic sessions and is divided into the Lower sixth and upper sixth forms. Although there is an opportunity of a fast-track programme of 15 months.

1. The Lower Sixth Form

The subjects will be three compulsory subjects namely;

  • English Language
  • Mathematics
  • ICT
  • Plus, three A – Level subjects related to the intended university course.

 

A-LEVEL SUBJECTS: 

Biology, Physics, Chemistry, Economics, Business Studies, Mathematics, Psychology, Accounting Sociology, Further Mathematics, Geography, Literature in English and ICT.

The core A-level takes 6 hours per week per subject while English language and mathematics take 3 hours a week with ICT taking 2 hours.

2. The Upper Sixth Form

Any student that opted to continue will only concentrate on the three core subjects only (Three A – Level Subjects). It also involves Seminar, presentation and research methods.

The University Foundation Programme

This is a one – year programme which would lead to admission into our partner universities in US, UK, Europe and Canada. It also gives students the opportunity of high score for choice courses through UTME and Post UTME for those who desire to study in Nigerian universities. 

Pre - University Programme

This is a one-year programme designed to prepare SSCE holders for university admission. It will specifically prepare students for UTME, Post UTME, SAT I & II, IELTS, and TOEFL. The requirement for this programme is six credits at one sitting in the SSCE. The basic subjects will be Mathematics, English Language, and ICT, plus three core subjects related to the intended university course. While English language constitutes the fourth subject for UTME, Mathematics, and English form the bedrock of SAT whereas English language is the major component of IELTS and TOEFL.

Please note that a good IELTS score also enhances getting placement in UK universities.

SSCE Improvement Study Programme​

This programme also offers opportunity to students who wish to retake SSCE as well as writing the UTME and Post UTME. It will offer them the opportunity of improving their grades and obtain high mark for UTME. The target is to groom students for choice courses.

Other Aspects Of The Programme

  • The A Level and University Foundation Students have the opportunity to write SAT, TOEFL, IELTS, and UTME.
  • All students are well grounded in ICT, Mathematics, and English Language as the foundation for a successful academic or professional career.
  • Development of presentation skills and ICT skill development.
  • Social skills for life success
  • Leadership skills
  • Critical thinking skills
  • Study skill programme
  • Writing personal statements
  • Method: rigorous lectures, seminars, workshops, and tutorials.

Support Services

The following support services are also available:

*  Learning Support               *  Enrichment Programme

*  Counselling Services        *  Volunteering

*  Career Guidance              *  Guest Lectures

*  Personal Support              *  Financial Support

Admission Process

We welcome application from independent and ambitious students to our academically selective and inspirational sixth form. We offer places to external application to the sixth form subject to SSCE results and interview.
For admission enquiries, contact
For admission enquiries, contact 08083531974,08033050953 or reach out by mail via info@UPSS.com.ng.
